span.span: Indicates the hierarchical order in which navigation nodes are rendered for site-navigation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項列舉供控制項，指定用來呈現網站導覽節點的順序。The enumeration is used by the control to specify the ordering used to render site map nodes. 如果屬性設定為 RootToCurrent，導覽路徑會顯示在最常見的方式，從最上層節點至目前的節點，從左到右。If the property is set to RootToCurrent, the navigation path is displayed in the most common way, from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right. 如果設定 CurrentToRoot，以導覽路徑會顯示從目前節點的最上層節點，從左到右。If the is set to CurrentToRoot, the navigation path is displayed from the current node to the top-most node, from left to right. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性Web Form 網頁中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page.
